Disguised Knight Kitchen:
Wow, really? You really have no idea!
(Low whisper)
This is the Pagan Temple. It might look like a regular temple, but it's actually really dangerous! And if you don't have either a Visitor's Badge or Pagan's Badge, you'll be zombie meat for the Gatekeeper Zombies over there!
So you'd better return to the village fast. Geez, good thing I was here...whew.
